column3: Certain fiscal 2010 organizational reclassifications have been reflected retroactively to provide improved visibility and comparability. In fiscal 2009 and fiscal 2008, the reclassifications resulted in the transfer of revenue among the business units within the Services segment only. There was no impact on the previously reported segment financial results.

Net earnings available to participating securities were not significant for fiscal years 2010 and 2009. HP considers restricted stock that provides the holder with a non-forfeitable right to receive dividends to be a participating security.

There was no impact on the previously reported segment financial results. [2] Net earnings available to participating securities were not significant for fiscal years 2010 and 2009. HP considers restricted stock that provides the holder with a non-forfeitable right to receive dividends to be a participating security.
